_PHATSECTBUF Struct Reference
[Volume Support]

#include <phatvol.h>

Detailed Description

Sector buffer structure.


Data Fields

u_char * sect_data
 Sector data buffer.
u_long sect_num
 Sector currently stored in the buffer.
int sect_dirty
 If not zero, buffer needs to be written.
